'''''Astraeus asiaticus''''' is a species of [[Astraeus (genus)|false earthstar]] in the family [[Diplocystaceae]]. Described as a new species in 2007, it was originally found in north and northeastern areas of Thailand, where it grows in sandy or [[laterite]]-rich soil in dry lowland [[dipterocarp]] forests. The species has a wide distribution in Asia.<ref name=Phosri2007/>
